item.title: NPC drops help i need help! [508]
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

im running a 508 server and i need help why wont my npcs drop anything…

this is my npc drop code

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
//man
npcdrop = 1 1 995 5000
//farmer
npcdrop = 7 1 995 15000
[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

and it dosent work my npcs dont drop anything!

Read full topic
